scripts.setup: echo 'Step 1: Starting setup' && echo 'Step 2: Copying env file' && (cp $CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH/apps/web/.env.local apps/web/.env.local 2>/dev/null && echo 'Copied from CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH' || cp ~/.config/inbox-zero/.env.local apps/web/.env.local 2>/dev/null && echo 'Copied from ~/.config' || echo 'WARNING: No .env.local found') && echo 'Step 3: Setup complete'
